thread.title: Short-handed Dallas Mavericks drop preseason opener to the Denver Nuggets, 96-86
thread.title_full: Photos: Short-handed Dallas Mavericks drop preseason opener to the Denver Nuggets, 96-86 | Dallas Morning News

author: dallasnews
title: Short-handed Dallas Mavericks drop preseason opener to the Denver Nuggets, 96-86
text: Dallas Mavericks forward Charlie Villanueva (3) attempts a layup in between Denver Nuggets forward Kenneth Faried (35) and Denver Nuggets forward Danilo Gallinari (8) during the first half of play at American Airlines Center in Dallas on Tuesday, October 6, 2015.(Vernon Bryant/The Dallas Morning News)
